languages.text: "Знаете, шерин, что сильнее прочего заставляет врагов искать компромисс? Опасность потери любой выгоды. В ваших силах, при желании, забрать Горнило себе, пользуясь привилегиями Патента... почему бы вам не намекнуть на такую вероятность спорщикам?"

"Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"
languages.original_text: "Знаете, шерин, что сильнее прочего заставляет врагов искать компромисс? Опасность потери любой выгоды. В ваших силах, при желании, забрать Горнило себе, пользуясь привилегиями Патента... почему бы вам не намекнуть на такую вероятность спорщикам?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, do you know what is the best motivation that makes your enemies look for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself, using the privilege of your Warrant, if you would ever so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the debaters?"

"Shereen, do you know what is the best motivation that makes your enemies look for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself, using the privilege of your Warrant, if you would ever so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the debaters?"

"Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

"Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

"Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

"Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

languages.text: “亲爱的，你知道最能让敌人妥协的动机是什么吗？是失去一切利益的风险。只要你愿意，你可以使用授状的力量，将熔炉据为己有……不如向双方暗示这样的可能性吧？”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，你知道最能让敌人妥协的动机是什么吗？是失去一切利益的风险。只要你愿意，你可以使用许可证的力量，将熔炉据为己有……不如向双方暗示这样的可能性吧？”

languages.text: «Shereen, ¿sabes cuál es la mejor motivación para hacer que tus enemigos estén listos para el pacto? El peligro de perder cualquier tipo de beneficio. Está en tu mano tomar el Crisol para ti usando el privilegio de tu Patente si así lo deseas... ¿Por qué no dejas caer tal posibilidad a las partes implicadas?».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, ¿sabes cuál es la mejor motivación para hacer que tus enemigos estén listos para el pacto? El peligro de perder cualquier tipo de beneficio. Está en tu mano tomar el Crisol para ti usando el privilegio de tu Patente si así lo deseas... ¿Por qué no dejas caer tal posibilidad a las partes implicadas?».

languages.text: 「シェリーン、敵に妥協する準備を与える最高の動機はなんだか知っているのかい？何らかの利益を失う危険性だ。もしアンタが望むなら、令状の特権を利用して、坩堝を自分のものにすることはできる...どうしてそのような可能性を当事者に伝えないのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、敵に妥協する準備を与える最高の動機はなんだか知っているのかい？何らかの利益を失う危険性だ。もしアンタが望むなら、令状の特権を利用して、坩堝を自分のものにすることはできる...どうしてそのような可能性を当事者に伝えないのだ？」

languages.text: « Savez-vous quelle est la meilleure des motivations pour amener vos ennemis à accepter un compromis ? La perspective qu'ils se retrouvent sans rien. En vertu de votre lettre de marque, vous avez le pouvoir de vous approprier le Creuset si vous le souhaitez... Pourquoi ne pas glisser subtilement cette possibilité à l'oreille des négociateurs ? »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

traits.locale_text: « Savez-vous quelle est la meilleure des motivations pour amener vos ennemis à accepter un compromis ? La perspective qu'ils se retrouvent sans rien. En vertu de votre lettre de marque, vous avez le pouvoir de vous approprier le Creuset si vous le souhaitez... Pourquoi ne pas glisser subtilement cette possibilité à l'oreille des négociateurs ? »

languages.text: "Shereen, wisst Ihr, wie man seine Feinde am besten dazu motiviert, sich auf einen Kompromiss einzulassen? Durch die Gefahr, jeden Vorteil zu verlieren. Der Handelsbrief verleiht Euch die Macht, Euch den Tiegel einfach selbst zu nehmen, wenn Ihr das möchtet ... Warum weist Ihr die Beteiligten nicht auf diese Möglichkeit hin?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, wisst Ihr, wie man seine Feinde am besten dazu motiviert, sich auf einen Kompromiss einzulassen? Durch die Gefahr, jeden Vorteil zu verlieren. Der Handelsbrief verleiht Euch die Macht, Euch den Tiegel einfach selbst zu nehmen, wenn Ihr das möchtet ... Warum weist Ihr die Beteiligten nicht auf diese Möglichkeit hin?"

languages.text: "Şirinim, düşmanlarını uzlaşmaya açık bir hâle getirmek için en iyi motivasyonun ne olduğunu biliyor musun? Sahip oldukları bir haktan yoksun kalma tehlikesi. Dilersen Ruhsatname'nin ayrıcalıklarını kullanarak Pota'yı ele geçirme gücüne sahipsin. Dâhil olan tarafları neden böyle bir olasılıktan haberdar etmiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, do you know the best motivation to make your enemies ripe for the compromise? The danger of losing any sort of benefit. It is within your power to take the Crucible for yourself using the privilege of your Warrant if you so desire... Why do you not imply such a possibility to the parties involved?"
